pytak.txworker_factoryÔÉÅ

async pytak.txworker_factory(queue: Queue, config: SectionProxy) → TXWorkerÔÉÅ

Create a PyTAK TXWorker based on URL parameters.

Parameters:

  • cot_url ‚Äì URL to COT Destination.

  • event_queue ‚Äì asyncio.Queue worker to get events from.

Returns:

EventWorker or asyncio Protocol
